item.description:
For those of you interested in art or in French culture.  This is a one-time showing of a documentary about a Manet exhibit being held at the Royal Academy of Arts (London), with a behind-the-scenes look at the exhibit, the paintings, and also promises to present a biography of Edouard Manet and a profile of 19th century Paris.

Here is more info on the film:

amherstcinema.org/films-and-events/manet-portraying-life#times

If planning to attend, it is highly recommended to purchase your tickets in advance and as soon as possible, as these events may sell out.

The film starts at 7:30.  If you would like to sit together, I will be in the lobby at 7:00.

See you then!

Romy
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Lobby at 7:00 to sit together for 7:30 show
item.name: Soiree Cinema: Manet - Portraying Life
